name: Publish your brownfield land data
provision-guidance: [The Town and Country Planning (Brownfield Land Register) Regulations 2017](http://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2017/403/contents/made) requires local planning authorities to maintain a register of brownfield sites suitable for housing.
summary: When updating your brownfield land register, follow this guidance on how to format, label and publish the data.

name: Publish your local plans data
provision-guidance: Providing this data is optional, but enables a Local Planning Authority to improve data on the [Planning Data](https://planning.data.gov.uk) platform.
summary: Follow this guidance on how to format, label and publish data about your local plan, housing numbers and its timetable.
